text: The Academy Awards nominations were announced on Tuesday morning in Los Angeles by Tiffany Haddish and Andy Serkis. And it wasn't long before the stars reacted to the good news. Allison Janney, 58, told Good Morning America she never thought she would get an Oscar nomination. On Tuesday she got her first for I, Tonya.'I could not be more excited. It ’ s a dream come true,'Janney said. A thrill : Allison Janney, 58, told Good Morning America she never thought she would get an Oscar nomination. On Tuesday she got her first for I, Tonya ; seen at the Critic's Choice Awards In character :'I could not be more excited. It ’ s a dream come true,'Janney said She got a nod too : Margot Robbie also
